actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Punching Spines or Throw Spines. If it hits one creature with both Punching Spines target is grappled (escape DC 13). Erina can grapple only one target at a time.

actions.name: Punching Spines
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Throw Spine
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 20/60' one target 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage and spine sticks in target until a creature uses an action to remove it. While spine is stuck target has disadvantage on weapon attacks that use Str.

special_abilities.name: Arm Spine Regrowth
special_abilities.desc: The erina has twenty-four arm spines that it can use to make Throw Spine attacks. Used spines regrow when it finishes a long rest.

special_abilities.name: Expert Wrestler
special_abilities.desc: The erina can grapple creatures two sizes larger than itself and can move at its full speed when dragging a creature it has grappled. If it grapples a Small or smaller creature target has disadvantage on its escape attempts. Erina has advantage on ability checks and saves made to escape a grapple or end restrained condition.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on saves vs. poison.

special_abilities.name: Spines
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches erina or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage. A creature grappled by or grappling erina takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage at start of the erina's turn.
